snippet.title: Infinity Girl (2023 Teaser Trailer): A high-speed rhythm/roguelike
snippet.description:
Download the 7 Level mini-roguelike demo of Infinity Girl now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1828280/Infinity_Girl/

And make sure to wishlist the game while you're at it ;-)

Infinity Girl is a high-speed rhythm/racer/roguelike where everything — every action, every enemy and every world you encounter — is driven by the beat of the music. Each run is unique, with procedural levels that test your skills as you grind, drift, boost and leap to the rhythm.

Features:
-Tight, expressive controls tied to every beat
-A hypnotic and procedurally generated electronic soundtrack
-Vibrant cel-shaded art and surreal, music-driven visuals
-Dodge obstacles and take down enemies that move to the rhythm
-Powerful abilities and upgrades that transform every run
-Pick up items that slow time, turn you into a wrecking ball or give you the power of flight
-Challenge modes and achievements that reward mastery and make the game highly replayable
-Race to The Orb™ before time runs out (and this world is destroyed)
